text: Eligible women were randomised into two groups 'A' and 'B'. Group A was administered 4 doses of 6mg dexamethasone 12 hours apart. Group B was administered 2 doses of 12 mg of dexamethasone 24 hours apart. The women were followed for seven successive days since the date of their admission.
sentences: Eligible women were randomised into two groups 'A' and 'B'.
Group A was administered 4 doses of 6mg dexamethasone 12 hours apart.
Group B was administered 2 doses of 12 mg of dexamethasone 24 hours apart.
The women were followed for seven successive days since the date of their admission.
